name: Moro Interactive, LLC
description:
We are a full service Mobile Application Development and Mobile Marketing firm located in Kalamazoo, MI. We specialize in custom and module mobile apps and develop using a cross platform methodology.
Discover more about Moro Interactive and the mobile application development industry, take our comprehensive online tour located at http://morointeractive.com/tour/. At Moro Interactive, teamwork is the foundation of our organization. Passion and ambition drive us to provide the best technology and support in the industry utilizing the best talent in the industry. By applying an extraordinary research and development model within Moro, we've created a magnetism that allows us to lock arms with technological growth. Our mission is to provide awesome applications with rich functionality in order to generate customer success and loyalty!
